name: vnr-mindmap
description: Interactive mindmap for Vietnamese Communist Party History

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdirs && npm run copy-html && npm run minify
scripts.minify-js:main: uglifyjs js/data.js js/mindmap.js js/interactions.js js/animations.js js/main.js -c -m -o dist/js/app.min.js
scripts.postbuild:
node -e "require('replace-in-file').sync({ files: 'dist/main.html', from: [/    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles/main.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles/mindmap.css">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles/animations.css">/g, /<script src="https\://d3js.org/d3.v7.min.js"></script>
    <script src="js/data.js"></script>
    <script src="js/mindmap.js"></script>
    <script src="js/interactions.js"></script>
    <script src="js/animations.js"></script>
    <script src="js/main.js"></script>/g], to: ['    <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles/main.min.css">', '<script src="js/app.min.js"></script>'] }); require('replace-in-file').sync({ files: 'dist/index.html', from: [/styles/intro.css/g, /js/intro.js/g], to: ['styles/intro.min.css', 'js/intro.min.js'] });"

author: VNR Mindmap Team
